Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 76th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2009...
Traded from Atlanta to Colorado on 2/23/2010 (Going to COL: P A. Warren, P J. Rudnick, P T. Watson, P C. Marmol, LF B. Broussard. Going to ATL: P C. Sabathia, LF A. Escobar, P W. Littleton)...
Injured on 4/7/2011 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/19/2013, off Andy Sonnanstine (ARI)...
Earned first career win on 7/19/2013...
Injured on 5/28/2014 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/5/2016 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/1/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/17/2021 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/13/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
